entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is the Potions master who has a strained relationship with Harry Potter. He made snide remarks to Sirius Black about remaining safely hidden while the rest of the Order of the Phoenix were fighting Voldemort.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry is the main protagonist who has a strained relationship with Snape. He blames Snape for Sirius' death.

entities.name: sirius black
entities.description: Sirius is Harry's godfather and an important member of the Order of the Phoenix. He died after rushing off to the Ministry.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a wise and powerful wizard who is the headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

relationships.description: Harry blames Snape for Sirius' death, which he believes was caused by Snape's snide remarks to Sirius about remaining safely hidden while the rest of the Order of the Phoenix were fighting Voldemort.
Harry has a strained relationship with Snape, which is evident from his thoughts about Snape's attitude towards Sirius.
Dumbledore's words have no effect on Harry's perception of Snape, who he believes was responsible for Sirius' death.
